Projects

Here are some of the projects I’ve worked on:

  • Web Application Deployment to Azure VM

    Project Overview: Successfully deployed a web application to an Azure Virtual Machine, demonstrating a comprehensive understanding of server management, file transfer protocols, and web server configuration.

    Technical Skills Demonstrated:

    • SSH and SCP/SFTP: Used SSH for secure remote access and SCP/SFTP for file transfers.
    • Apache Configuration: Configured Apache web server to serve web application files, including setting up virtual hosts and directory permissions.
    • Troubleshooting: Diagnosed and resolved issues related to file permissions, directory structures, and server settings.

    Steps Taken:

    1. Server Setup: Configured an Azure VM to host the web application. Set up SSH for secure remote access.
    2. File Transfer: Utilized SCP and SFTP to transfer application files from local machine to the Azure VM. Ensured correct directory structure and file permissions.
    3. Web Server Configuration: Configured Apache to serve the web application. Edited Apache’s configuration files to set the document root and directory permissions. Addressed and resolved configuration errors, ensuring the server correctly served `index.html` and other necessary files.
    4. Problem-Solving: Identified and corrected issues causing the "Permission denied" and "connection to unknown port -1" errors. Adjusted firewall settings and network configurations to ensure stable and secure connections. Ensured images and other assets were properly displayed by verifying file paths and permissions.

    Outcome: Successfully deployed the web application, showcasing technical proficiency in server management, secure file transfer, and web server configuration. Overcame multiple challenges, demonstrating strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
